entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greenwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:53 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Greenwood 2:48 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
